game.name: Extinction Day
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Extinction Day is a doomsday simulator where you wipe out humanity using disasters, diseases, wars, and other catastrophic events. Spread chaos worldwide, combine catastrophes for maximum destruction, and crush humanity's efforts to survive in this game of world-ending mayhem.
